price: Arrancava os homens como se foram troncos de tamareiras desarraigadas.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
